title: Even Wilder
description: I didn’t fall in love, it drop kicked me in the face.We all fall in love.And we all go through heart break.It’s beautiful but it always ends. That’s why I don’t want any part of it.I close my eyes hoping it will pass. When I open them back up—I’m still lost in it.Love is the impact after the bang. Love is going to destroy us.I have never fit in.Insignificant.Quiet.Alone. That’s me, Violet.Wilder Elordi’s has always been a wreck.Neglected.Abused.Broken.He’s protected me since first grade. We aren’t just friends we are in love with each other. But moving away for college changes everything.Our love for each other is more than we know what to do with. It’s explosive and can’t be contained.
author: Bria Leigh
